Cuba Libre.title: Cuba Libre
Cuba Libre.instructions: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Kir Royale.title: Kir Royale
Kir Royale.instructions: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top

After Dinner Cocktail.title: After Dinner Cocktail
After Dinner Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

Queen Bee.title: Queen Bee
Queen Bee.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Cafe Savoy.title: Cafe Savoy
Cafe Savoy.instructions: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

Army special.title: Army special
Army special.instructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

English Highball.title: English Highball
English Highball.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

Baby Guinness.title: Baby Guinness
Baby Guinness.instructions: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".

Acapulco.title: Acapulco
Acapulco.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

New York Sour.title: New York Sour
New York Sour.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

Gin Rickey.title: Gin Rickey
Gin Rickey.instructions: Half-fill a tall glass with ice. Mix the gin and Grenadine together and pour over the ice. Add the lime or lemon juice and top off with soda water. Decorate the glass with lime and/or lemon slices.

Flying Dutchman.title: Flying Dutchman
Flying Dutchman.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft.title: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft.instructions: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

Danbooka.title: Danbooka
Danbooka.instructions: pour it in and mix it.

Diesel.title: Diesel
Diesel.instructions: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness.

Boston Sidecar.title: Boston Sidecar
Boston Sidecar.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Highland Fling Cocktail.title: Highland Fling Cocktail
Highland Fling Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

Archbishop.title: Archbishop
Archbishop.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

Gluehwein.title: Gluehwein
Gluehwein.instructions: Boil sugar and spices in water, leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol, let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.

Gin Squirt.title: Gin Squirt
Gin Squirt.instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

Manhattan.title: Manhattan
Manhattan.instructions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Apple Pie with A Crust.title: Apple Pie with A Crust
Apple Pie with A Crust.instructions: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.

Lone Tree Cocktail.title: Lone Tree Cocktail
Lone Tree Cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

A Day at the Beach.title: A Day at the Beach
A Day at the Beach.instructions: Shake Rum, Amaretto, and Orange Juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain over ice into a highball glass. Add Grenadine and garnish with a Pineapple Wedge and a Strawberry.

Big Red.title: Big Red
Big Red.instructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

Amaretto Rose.title: Amaretto Rose
Amaretto Rose.instructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

Royal Fizz.title: Royal Fizz
Royal Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

Americano.title: Americano
Americano.instructions: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

Miami Vice.title: Miami Vice
Miami Vice.instructions: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

John Collins.title: John Collins
John Collins.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

Boulevardier.title: Boulevardier
Boulevardier.instructions: Stir with ice, strain, garnish and serve.

Gideon's Green Dinosaur.title: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
Gideon's Green Dinosaur.instructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.

After Supper Cocktail.title: After Supper Cocktail
After Supper Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Mary Pickford.title: Mary Pickford
Mary Pickford.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

Tia-Maria.title: Tia-Maria
Tia-Maria.instructions: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

Space Odyssey.title: Space Odyssey
Space Odyssey.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

Zizi Coin-coin.title: Zizi Coin-coin
Zizi Coin-coin.instructions: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

Valencia Cocktail.title: Valencia Cocktail
Valencia Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Texas Sling.title: Texas Sling
Texas Sling.instructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

69 Special.title: 69 Special
69 Special.instructions: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.

Amaretto Sunset.title: Amaretto Sunset
Amaretto Sunset.instructions: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.

Vesper.title: Vesper
Vesper.instructions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

Lassi - Mango.title: Lassi - Mango
Lassi - Mango.instructions: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

Kamikaze.title: Kamikaze
Kamikaze.instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

Irish Curdling Cow.title: Irish Curdling Cow
Irish Curdling Cow.instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

Happy Skipper.title: Happy Skipper
Happy Skipper.instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

Adonis Cocktail.title: Adonis Cocktail
Adonis Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Oatmeal Cookie.title: Oatmeal Cookie
Oatmeal Cookie.instructions:
Just mix it all together.
It's meant to be a shot, but it works just fine as a proper adult-sized drink over lots of ice.

Tastes like an oatmeal cookie.

Grasshopper.title: Grasshopper
Grasshopper.instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Rosemary Blue.title: Rosemary Blue
Rosemary Blue.instructions:
1) Add the Bombay Sapphire, Blue Curacao, rosemary sprig and gently squeezed lemon wedge to a balloon glass. Swirl well to combine.
2) Fill with cubed ice and top with the Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water.
3) Gently fold with a bar spoon to mix.

Bruised Heart.title: Bruised Heart
Bruised Heart.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass

English Rose Cocktail.title: English Rose Cocktail
English Rose Cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

Royal Flush.title: Royal Flush
Royal Flush.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

Queen Charlotte.title: Queen Charlotte
Queen Charlotte.instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

Cranberry Punch.title: Cranberry Punch
Cranberry Punch.instructions: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved, chill. Then add ginger ale just before serving. Add ice ring to keep punch cold.

Horse's Neck.title: Horse's Neck
Horse's Neck.instructions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

Scotch Sour.title: Scotch Sour
Scotch Sour.instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

Apricot punch.title: Apricot punch
Apricot punch.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.

Avalanche.title: Avalanche
Avalanche.instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

Darkwood Sling.title: Darkwood Sling
Darkwood Sling.instructions: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

Adam Sunrise.title: Adam Sunrise
Adam Sunrise.instructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

Mai Tai.title: Mai Tai
Mai Tai.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

Alaska Cocktail.title: Alaska Cocktail
Alaska Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

Orange Scented Hot Chocolate.title: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
Orange Scented Hot Chocolate.instructions: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

Chocolate Monkey.title: Chocolate Monkey
Chocolate Monkey.instructions: blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

Banana Strawberry Shake.title: Banana Strawberry Shake
Banana Strawberry Shake.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

110 in the shade.title: 110 in the shade
110 in the shade.instructions: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer

Foxy Lady.title: Foxy Lady
Foxy Lady.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

Tuxedo Cocktail.title: Tuxedo Cocktail
Tuxedo Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

Coffee Liqueur.title: Coffee Liqueur
Coffee Liqueur.instructions: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

Apricot Lady.title: Apricot Lady
Apricot Lady.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

Scotch Cobbler.title: Scotch Cobbler
Scotch Cobbler.instructions: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

Aztec Punch.title: Aztec Punch
Aztec Punch.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.

Chicago Fizz.title: Chicago Fizz
Chicago Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Mother's Milk.title: Mother's Milk
Mother's Milk.instructions: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

Baby Eskimo.title: Baby Eskimo
Baby Eskimo.instructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

Melya.title: Melya
Melya.instructions: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

Rum Toddy.title: Rum Toddy
Rum Toddy.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

Homemade Kahlua.title: Homemade Kahlua
Homemade Kahlua.instructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.

Kiwi Papaya Smoothie.title: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
Kiwi Papaya Smoothie.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

Godfather.title: Godfather
Godfather.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Fuzzy Asshole.title: Fuzzy Asshole
Fuzzy Asshole.instructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

Mudslinger.title: Mudslinger
Mudslinger.instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

Sweet Bananas.title: Sweet Bananas
Sweet Bananas.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Popped cherry.title: Popped cherry
Popped cherry.instructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

Adam Bomb.title: Adam Bomb
Adam Bomb.instructions: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.

Orange Oasis.title: Orange Oasis
Orange Oasis.instructions: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

Rum Runner.title: Rum Runner
Rum Runner.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

Moranguito.title: Moranguito
Moranguito.instructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

Absolut limousine.title: Absolut limousine
Absolut limousine.instructions: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

Waikiki Beachcomber.title: Waikiki Beachcomber
Waikiki Beachcomber.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Addison.title: Addison
Addison.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

Caipirissima.title: Caipirissima
Caipirissima.instructions: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!

Thai Iced Coffee.title: Thai Iced Coffee
Thai Iced Coffee.instructions: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

Hunter's Moon.title: Hunter's Moon
Hunter's Moon.instructions: Put the Bombay Sapphire, Martini Bianco, sugar syrup & blackberries in a cocktail shaker with lots of ice and shake vigorously before pouring into a balloon glass, topping up with lemonade and garnishing with a wedge of orange.

French Connection.title: French Connection
French Connection.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Jitterbug.title: Jitterbug
Jitterbug.instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

Yoghurt Cooler.title: Yoghurt Cooler
Yoghurt Cooler.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up. Note: Use lots of ice in this one - great on hot days! To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

Russian Spring Punch.title: Russian Spring Punch
Russian Spring Punch.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Clover Club.title: Clover Club
Clover Club.instructions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

Arizona Twister.title: Arizona Twister
Arizona Twister.instructions: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

Brandy Cobbler.title: Brandy Cobbler
Brandy Cobbler.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

Spritz.title: Spritz
Spritz.instructions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Mimosa.title: Mimosa
Mimosa.instructions: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

Bluebird.title: Bluebird
Bluebird.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

Orange Push-up.title: Orange Push-up
Orange Push-up.instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

Tommy's Margarita.title: Tommy's Margarita
Tommy's Margarita.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Alabama Slammer.title: Alabama Slammer
Alabama Slammer.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

Artillery Punch.title: Artillery Punch
Artillery Punch.instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. If found too dry, sugar syrup may be added. Decorate with twists of lemon peel.

Boomerang.title: Boomerang
Boomerang.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

Grass Skirt.title: Grass Skirt
Grass Skirt.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

Turf Cocktail.title: Turf Cocktail
Turf Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

Espresso Martini.title: Espresso Martini
Espresso Martini.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

Apple Grande.title: Apple Grande
Apple Grande.instructions: Chill both ingredients!! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

Applecar.title: Applecar
Applecar.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Pink Lady.title: Pink Lady
Pink Lady.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Zippy's Revenge.title: Zippy's Revenge
Zippy's Revenge.instructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

Talos Coffee.title: Talos Coffee
Talos Coffee.instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

Brandy Sour.title: Brandy Sour
Brandy Sour.instructions: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

Pink Penocha.title: Pink Penocha
Pink Penocha.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

Brave Bull Shooter.title: Brave Bull Shooter
Brave Bull Shooter.instructions: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

Algonquin.title: Algonquin
Algonquin.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Quarter Deck Cocktail.title: Quarter Deck Cocktail
Quarter Deck Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

White Russian.title: White Russian
White Russian.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

Dark Caipirinha.title: Dark Caipirinha
Dark Caipirinha.instructions:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cachaca into the glass.
Stir well.

Flaming Lamborghini.title: Flaming Lamborghini
Flaming Lamborghini.instructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

Brigadier.title: Brigadier
Brigadier.instructions: Mix ingredients in a warmed mug and stir.

Castillian Hot Chocolate.title: Castillian Hot Chocolate
Castillian Hot Chocolate.instructions: Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water, and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. Begin heating the mixture, stirring it with a whisk, and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring often, until it is thick, glossy and completely smooth. Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

Girl From Ipanema.title: Girl From Ipanema
Girl From Ipanema.instructions: Add the cachaca, lemon juice and syrup to your boston glass. Add ice and shake until ice cold. Pour into a chilled flute and top-up with Champagne

Old Fashioned.title: Old Fashioned
Old Fashioned.instructions:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

Amaretto Stinger.title: Amaretto Stinger
Amaretto Stinger.instructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Brain Fart.title: Brain Fart
Brain Fart.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

Affinity.title: Affinity
Affinity.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Coke and Drops.title: Coke and Drops
Coke and Drops.instructions: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.

Vodka Fizz.title: Vodka Fizz
Vodka Fizz.instructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

London Town.title: London Town
London Town.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Banana Strawberry Shake Daiquiri-type.title: Banana Strawberry Shake Daiquiri-type
Banana Strawberry Shake Daiquiri-type.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

Porto flip.title: Porto flip
Porto flip.instructions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

Butter Baby.title: Butter Baby
Butter Baby.instructions: Blend together in a blender. Serve in a chilled Beer mug with Fresh Blueberries and caramel for topping.

Imperial Fizz.title: Imperial Fizz
Imperial Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Imperial Cocktail.title: Imperial Cocktail
Imperial Cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

Corpse Reviver #2.title: Corpse Reviver #2
Corpse Reviver #2.instructions: Shake, strain, straight up, cocktail glass rinsed with absinthe

Sweet Sangria.title: Sweet Sangria
Sweet Sangria.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.

Hawaiian Cocktail.title: Hawaiian Cocktail
Hawaiian Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Sol Y Sombra.title: Sol Y Sombra
Sol Y Sombra.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

Artillery.title: Artillery
Artillery.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Red Snapper.title: Red Snapper
Red Snapper.instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

Avalon.title: Avalon
Avalon.instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

Snake Bite (UK).title: Snake Bite (UK)
Snake Bite (UK).instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.

Sherry Eggnog.title: Sherry Eggnog
Sherry Eggnog.instructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Bruce's Puce.title: Bruce's Puce
Bruce's Puce.instructions: In a regular-sized shot glass, layer, with a spoon or cherry, the grenadine , the Kahlua , then the Bailey's Irish cream in equal portions. It goes down really smooth ,and you don't even need a chaser. It tastes just like chocolate milk.(Really!)

Amaretto Stone Sour #3.title: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
Amaretto Stone Sour #3.instructions: Shake sour mix, tequila and amaretto with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of OJ. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

Tom Collins.title: Tom Collins
Tom Collins.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

GG.title: GG
GG.instructions: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

Kool First Aid.title: Kool First Aid
Kool First Aid.instructions: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

Allegheny.title: Allegheny
Allegheny.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

9 1/2 Weeks.title: 9 1/2 Weeks
9 1/2 Weeks.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.

Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie.title: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

Downshift.title: Downshift
Downshift.instructions: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

Gin Fizz.title: Gin Fizz
Gin Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

Tequila Fizz.title: Tequila Fizz
Tequila Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

Black Russian.title: Black Russian
Black Russian.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Arctic Mouthwash.title: Arctic Mouthwash
Arctic Mouthwash.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

Greyhound.title: Greyhound
Greyhound.instructions:
1. Add the vodka to a Collins glass filled with ice.
2. Top with grapefruit juice and stir.

Alice in Wonderland.title: Alice in Wonderland
Alice in Wonderland.instructions: Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one

Campari Beer.title: Campari Beer
Campari Beer.instructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

3 Wise Men.title: 3 Wise Men
3 Wise Men.instructions: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

Zimadori Zinger.title: Zimadori Zinger
Zimadori Zinger.instructions: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

Sweet Tooth.title: Sweet Tooth
Sweet Tooth.instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

Bellini.title: Bellini
Bellini.instructions: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

ACID.title: ACID
ACID.instructions: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

Owen's Grandmother's Revenge.title: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge
Owen's Grandmother's Revenge.instructions: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

Amaretto Sunrise.title: Amaretto Sunrise
Amaretto Sunrise.instructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

Bloody Maria.title: Bloody Maria
Bloody Maria.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

Vampiro.title: Vampiro
Vampiro.instructions: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.

Berry Deadly.title: Berry Deadly
Berry Deadly.instructions: Add all ingredients to large bowl. Stir gently. Serve chilled.

Grizzly Bear.title: Grizzly Bear
Grizzly Bear.instructions: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

Lone Tree Cooler.title: Lone Tree Cooler
Lone Tree Cooler.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

Buccaneer.title: Buccaneer
Buccaneer.instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently

Addington.title: Addington
Addington.instructions: Mix both the vermouth's in a shaker and strain into a cold glass. Top up with a squirt of Soda Water.

501 Blue.title: 501 Blue
501 Blue.instructions: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

Absolutly Screwed Up.title: Absolutly Screwed Up
Absolutly Screwed Up.instructions: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

Sunny Holiday Punch.title: Sunny Holiday Punch
Sunny Holiday Punch.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea.title: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea
3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea.instructions: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.

Brainteaser.title: Brainteaser
Brainteaser.instructions: layered erin first, then sambuca and then avocart(should sit in middle of other two. To drink: use a straw to suck up avocart then shot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

Raspberry Cooler.title: Raspberry Cooler
Raspberry Cooler.instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Bourbon Sour.title: Bourbon Sour
Bourbon Sour.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

Zombie.title: Zombie
Zombie.instructions:
Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.

Pour into a glass, add ice cubes to fill, then add the garnish.

*Donn’s mix: Bring 3 crushed cinnamon sticks, 1 cup of sugar and 1 cup of water to a boil, stirring until the sugar is dissolved.

Simmer for 2 minutes, then remove from the heat and let sit for at least 2 hours before straining into a clean glass bottle.

Then add 1 part of the syrup and 2 parts of fresh grapefruit juice together.

Clove Cocktail.title: Clove Cocktail
Clove Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Amaretto Sweet & Sour.title: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
Amaretto Sweet & Sour.instructions: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1" of pineapple juice, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.

Citrus Coke.title: Citrus Coke
Citrus Coke.instructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

Mocha-Berry.title: Mocha-Berry
Mocha-Berry.instructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

Rum Cooler.title: Rum Cooler
Rum Cooler.instructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

151 Florida Bushwacker.title: 151 Florida Bushwacker
151 Florida Bushwacker.instructions: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.

Chocolate Black Russian.title: Chocolate Black Russian
Chocolate Black Russian.instructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

Kill the cold Smoothie.title: Kill the cold Smoothie
Kill the cold Smoothie.instructions: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardomom.

Egg Nog #4.title: Egg Nog #4
Egg Nog #4.instructions: In a small mixer bowl beat egg yolks till blended. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored. Stir in milk, stir in rum, bourbon, vanilla, and salt. Chill thoroughly. Whip cream. Wash beaters well. In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar, beating to stiff peaks. Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites. Serve immediately. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl. NOTE: For a nonalcoholic eggnog, prepare Eggnog as above, except omit the bourbon and rum and increase the milk to 3 cups.

Frozen Mint Daiquiri.title: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
Frozen Mint Daiquiri.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

Boston Sour.title: Boston Sour
Boston Sour.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

New York Lemonade.title: New York Lemonade
New York Lemonade.instructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

Caipirinha.title: Caipirinha
Caipirinha.instructions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.

Dragonfly.title: Dragonfly
Dragonfly.instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

Bourbon Sling.title: Bourbon Sling
Bourbon Sling.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Irish Russian.title: Irish Russian
Irish Russian.instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.

Abbey Martini.title: Abbey Martini
Abbey Martini.instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker and mix, then strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass.

Vesuvio.title: Vesuvio
Vesuvio.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Gin Swizzle.title: Gin Swizzle
Gin Swizzle.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

Victory Collins.title: Victory Collins
Victory Collins.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

Paloma.title: Paloma
Paloma.instructions: Stir together and serve over ice.

Bumble Bee #1.title: Bumble Bee #1
Bumble Bee #1.instructions: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

Monkey Wrench.title: Monkey Wrench
Monkey Wrench.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Drinking Chocolate.title: Drinking Chocolate
Drinking Chocolate.instructions: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.

Zorbatini.title: Zorbatini
Zorbatini.instructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

Damned if you do.title: Damned if you do
Damned if you do.instructions: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.

Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri.title: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

Lassi Raita.title: Lassi Raita
Lassi Raita.instructions: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

Shot-gun.title: Shot-gun
Shot-gun.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

Absolut Stress #2.title: Absolut Stress #2
Absolut Stress #2.instructions: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy

Lemon Drop.title: Lemon Drop
Lemon Drop.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

Aviation.title: Aviation
Aviation.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Paradise.title: Paradise
Paradise.instructions: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

Mississippi Planters Punch.title: Mississippi Planters Punch
Mississippi Planters Punch.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Abbey Cocktail.title: Abbey Cocktail
Abbey Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

Chocolate Milk.title: Chocolate Milk
Chocolate Milk.instructions: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!

Kentucky B And B.title: Kentucky B And B
Kentucky B And B.instructions: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

Grand Blue.title: Grand Blue
Grand Blue.instructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass.

Jamaica Kiss.title: Jamaica Kiss
Jamaica Kiss.instructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

Absinthe #2.title: Absinthe #2
Absinthe #2.instructions: Mix together and let sit a few days. Strain through a coffee filter. To serve mix 1 part absinthe to 4 parts water, add ice, enjoy.

Vodka Martini.title: Vodka Martini
Vodka Martini.instructions: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

Quentin.title: Quentin
Quentin.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

B-53.title: B-53
B-53.instructions: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

Lord And Lady.title: Lord And Lady
Lord And Lady.instructions: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Blue Lagoon.title: Blue Lagoon
Blue Lagoon.instructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

Strawberry Lemonade.title: Strawberry Lemonade
Strawberry Lemonade.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and mix until fairly smooth. Serve over ice.

Lunch Box.title: Lunch Box
Lunch Box.instructions: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

A midsummernight dream.title: A midsummernight dream
A midsummernight dream.instructions: Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water

Sloe Gin Cocktail.title: Sloe Gin Cocktail
Sloe Gin Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Shanghai Cocktail.title: Shanghai Cocktail
Shanghai Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Grape lemon pineapple Smoothie.title: Grape lemon pineapple Smoothie
Grape lemon pineapple Smoothie.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

Pink Gin.title: Pink Gin
Pink Gin.instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

Jack Rose Cocktail.title: Jack Rose Cocktail
Jack Rose Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Bobby Burns Cocktail.title: Bobby Burns Cocktail
Bobby Burns Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

Salty Dog.title: Salty Dog
Salty Dog.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

Martinez 2.title: Martinez 2
Martinez 2.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice.

Stir until chilled, and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

California Root Beer.title: California Root Beer
California Root Beer.instructions: Put Kahlua and Galliano in highball glass fill with soda

Amaretto Tea.title: Amaretto Tea
Amaretto Tea.instructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

Scottish Highland Liqueur.title: Scottish Highland Liqueur
Scottish Highland Liqueur.instructions: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

French \"75\".title: French "75"
French \"75\".instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the Champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

Caribbean Boilermaker.title: Caribbean Boilermaker
Caribbean Boilermaker.instructions: Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.

Bora Bora.title: Bora Bora
Bora Bora.instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

Apple Karate.title: Apple Karate
Apple Karate.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Godchild.title: Godchild
Godchild.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

Mojito.title: Mojito
Mojito.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

Casa Blanca.title: Casa Blanca
Casa Blanca.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Port And Starboard.title: Port And Starboard
Port And Starboard.instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

Sazerac.title: Sazerac
Sazerac.instructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

Balmoral.title: Balmoral
Balmoral.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Atomic Lokade.title: Atomic Lokade
Atomic Lokade.instructions: In a shaker, place lemonade, vodka, blue Curacao, and triple sec together. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Add sugar to taste

Lady Love Fizz.title: Lady Love Fizz
Lady Love Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Zima Blaster.title: Zima Blaster
Zima Blaster.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

Caribbean Orange Liqueur.title: Caribbean Orange Liqueur
Caribbean Orange Liqueur.instructions: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the oranges (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups vodka. Close jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until the vodka has absorbed the flavor. Remove peel and add remaining vodka. Close jar and add remaining cup of vodka. Close the jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age.

Kiwi Lemon.title: Kiwi Lemon
Kiwi Lemon.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

Singapore Sling.title: Singapore Sling
Singapore Sling.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

Almond Chocolate Coffee.title: Almond Chocolate Coffee
Almond Chocolate Coffee.instructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

Dirty Nipple.title: Dirty Nipple
Dirty Nipple.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

Margarita.title: Margarita
Margarita.instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

Dark and Stormy.title: Dark and Stormy
Dark and Stormy.instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

Amaretto And Cream.title: Amaretto And Cream
Amaretto And Cream.instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

The Laverstoke.title: The Laverstoke
The Laverstoke.instructions:
1) Squeeze two lime wedges into a balloon glass then add the cordial, Bombay Sapphire and MARTINI Rosso Vermouth, swirl to mix.

2) Fully fill the glass with cubed ice and stir to chill.

3) Top with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale and gently stir again to combine.

4) Garnish with a snapped ginger slice and an awoken mint sprig.

Jam Donut.title: Jam Donut
Jam Donut.instructions: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass, and carefully layer the Baileys Irish Cream on top. Serve.

Casino Royale.title: Casino Royale
Casino Royale.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

Aloha Fruit punch.title: Aloha Fruit punch
Aloha Fruit punch.instructions: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger root. Boil 3 minutes. Strain. Add the liquid to the guava, lemon and pineapple juices. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water. Cool. Combine with juices and pineapple. Chill throroughly.

Cherry Electric Lemonade.title: Cherry Electric Lemonade
Cherry Electric Lemonade.instructions: Now stir vigorously and then pour over a large cup of ice. Now drink it with a straw and stir occasionally.

Microwave Hot Cocoa.title: Microwave Hot Cocoa
Microwave Hot Cocoa.instructions: Combine sugar, cocoa, salt and hot water in 1-quart micro-proof measuring cup (or coffee mug). Microwave at HIGH (100%) for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until boiling. Add milk, sitr and microwave an additonal 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until hot. Stir in vanilla, blend well.

Tennesee Mud.title: Tennesee Mud
Tennesee Mud.instructions: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

Blackthorn.title: Blackthorn
Blackthorn.instructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

Kioki Coffee.title: Kioki Coffee
Kioki Coffee.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

Casino.title: Casino
Casino.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

A Night In Old Mandalay.title: A Night In Old Mandalay
A Night In Old Mandalay.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, añejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

French Negroni.title: French Negroni
French Negroni.instructions:
1. Add ice to a shaker and pour in all ingredients.
2. Using a bar spoon, stir 40 to 45 revolutions or until thoroughly chilled.
3. Strain into a martini glass or over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with orange twist.

Havana Cocktail.title: Havana Cocktail
Havana Cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Iced Coffee Fillip.title: Iced Coffee Fillip
Iced Coffee Fillip.instructions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

Black Forest Shake.title: Black Forest Shake
Black Forest Shake.instructions: In a blender put ice cubes, chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk. Blend very well.

Sangria #1.title: Sangria #1
Sangria #1.instructions: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.

Planter's Punch.title: Planter's Punch
Planter's Punch.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

Karsk.title: Karsk
Karsk.instructions: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

Brandy Alexander.title: Brandy Alexander
Brandy Alexander.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Screaming Orgasm.title: Screaming Orgasm
Screaming Orgasm.instructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

Adam.title: Adam
Adam.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea.title: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

Zoksel.title: Zoksel
Zoksel.instructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

Sidecar Cocktail.title: Sidecar Cocktail
Sidecar Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Orange Whip.title: Orange Whip
Orange Whip.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

Zinger.title: Zinger
Zinger.instructions: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

Bloody Mary.title: Bloody Mary
Bloody Mary.instructions: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

Spiking coffee.title: Spiking coffee
Spiking coffee.instructions: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.

Frisco Sour.title: Frisco Sour
Frisco Sour.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

Harvey Wallbanger.title: Harvey Wallbanger
Harvey Wallbanger.instructions: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

Van Vleet.title: Van Vleet
Van Vleet.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Brandy Flip.title: Brandy Flip
Brandy Flip.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

Long Island Tea.title: Long Island Tea
Long Island Tea.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

Adam & Eve.title: Adam & Eve
Adam & Eve.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

Addison Special.title: Addison Special
Addison Special.instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

Quick-sand.title: Quick-sand
Quick-sand.instructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

Alexander.title: Alexander
Alexander.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Pina Colada.title: Pina Colada
Pina Colada.instructions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

Zipperhead.title: Zipperhead
Zipperhead.instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

Gin Toddy.title: Gin Toddy
Gin Toddy.instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

Apple Slammer.title: Apple Slammer
Apple Slammer.instructions: pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with thier palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

Sex on the Beach.title: Sex on the Beach
Sex on the Beach.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

Blue Mountain.title: Blue Mountain
Blue Mountain.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

City Slicker.title: City Slicker
City Slicker.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Veteran.title: Veteran
Veteran.instructions: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Martinez Cocktail.title: Martinez Cocktail
Martinez Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

Surf City Lifesaver.title: Surf City Lifesaver
Surf City Lifesaver.instructions: Lots of ice and soda top up in tall glass with cherry and a grin.

Vermouth Cassis.title: Vermouth Cassis
Vermouth Cassis.instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

Just a Moonmint.title: Just a Moonmint
Just a Moonmint.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Jelly Bean.title: Jelly Bean
Jelly Bean.instructions: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!

Bob Marley.title: Bob Marley
Bob Marley.instructions: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass

Port Wine Flip.title: Port Wine Flip
Port Wine Flip.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Bubble Gum.title: Bubble Gum
Bubble Gum.instructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.

Sea breeze.title: Sea breeze
Sea breeze.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Jewel Of The Nile.title: Jewel Of The Nile
Jewel Of The Nile.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Jello shots.title: Jello shots
Jello shots.instructions: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...

Strawberry Shivers.title: Strawberry Shivers
Strawberry Shivers.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Radler.title: Radler
Radler.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

Stone Sour.title: Stone Sour
Stone Sour.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

Yellow Bird.title: Yellow Bird
Yellow Bird.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Cosmopolitan Martini.title: Cosmopolitan Martini
Cosmopolitan Martini.instructions: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

Kool-Aid Slammer.title: Kool-Aid Slammer
Kool-Aid Slammer.instructions: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

'57 Chevy with a White License Plate.title: '57 Chevy with a White License Plate
'57 Chevy with a White License Plate.instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

Wine Punch.title: Wine Punch
Wine Punch.instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

Kurant Tea.title: Kurant Tea
Kurant Tea.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

Gimlet.title: Gimlet
Gimlet.instructions:
Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with a lime wheel.

Gagliardo.title: Gagliardo
Gagliardo.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

Barracuda.title: Barracuda
Barracuda.instructions: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Tequila Sour.title: Tequila Sour
Tequila Sour.instructions: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

A. J..title: A. J.
A. J..instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Holloween Punch.title: Holloween Punch
Holloween Punch.instructions: Take a bunch of grape juice and a bunch of fizzy stuff (club soda, ginger ale, lemonlime, whatever). Mix them in a punch bowl. Take orange sherbet and lime sherbet. Scoop out scoops and float them in the punch, let them melt a little so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch but there are still "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops. Looks horrible, tastes just fine.

Coffee-Vodka.title: Coffee-Vodka
Coffee-Vodka.instructions: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka, then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.

Smut.title: Smut
Smut.instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

Bijou.title: Bijou
Bijou.instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain

Blue Hurricane.title: Blue Hurricane
Blue Hurricane.instructions:
If each part is 1/2 oz then use about 2.5 cups of ice.

Blend it all together. 
Drink it with a big straw if you have one.

Thriller.title: Thriller
Thriller.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

A True Amaretto Sour.title: A True Amaretto Sour
A True Amaretto Sour.instructions: Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.

French Martini.title: French Martini
French Martini.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

Alfie Cocktail.title: Alfie Cocktail
Alfie Cocktail.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Irish Spring.title: Irish Spring
Irish Spring.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

H.D..title: H.D.
H.D..instructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

Martini.title: Martini
Martini.instructions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

Gin Smash.title: Gin Smash
Gin Smash.instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

Bacardi Cocktail.title: Bacardi Cocktail
Bacardi Cocktail.instructions: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve.

Boxcar.title: Boxcar
Boxcar.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

Herbal flame.title: Herbal flame
Herbal flame.instructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

Black & Tan.title: Black & Tan
Black & Tan.instructions: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

Texas Rattlesnake.title: Texas Rattlesnake
Texas Rattlesnake.instructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

Screwdriver.title: Screwdriver
Screwdriver.instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

Masala Chai.title: Masala Chai
Masala Chai.instructions: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

Gin And Tonic.title: Gin And Tonic
Gin And Tonic.instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

Bleeding Surgeon.title: Bleeding Surgeon
Bleeding Surgeon.instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

Amaretto Shake.title: Amaretto Shake
Amaretto Shake.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled glass garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

Egg Cream.title: Egg Cream
Egg Cream.instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.

Ipamena.title: Ipamena
Ipamena.instructions: Cut half a lime into pieces, place in a shaker, add the sugar and crush. Measure the passion fruit juice, add it to the shaker and fill up with ice cubes. Close the shaker and shake vigorously. Pour the liquid into a glass, top up with ginger ale, stir with a teaspoon and then garnish the rim of the glass with a slice of lime

Dry Rob Roy.title: Dry Rob Roy
Dry Rob Roy.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

747.instructions: pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

Mojito #3.title: Mojito #3
Mojito #3.instructions: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

Gentleman's Club.title: Gentleman's Club
Gentleman's Club.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

Fahrenheit 5000.title: Fahrenheit 5000
Fahrenheit 5000.instructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.

Zambeer.title: Zambeer
Zambeer.instructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

Mango Orange Smoothie.title: Mango Orange Smoothie
Mango Orange Smoothie.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

Lassi - Sweet.title: Lassi - Sweet
Lassi - Sweet.instructions: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

Fruit Flip-Flop.title: Fruit Flip-Flop
Fruit Flip-Flop.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

B-52.title: B-52
B-52.instructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

Salted Toffee Martini.title: Salted Toffee Martini
Salted Toffee Martini.instructions:
Add ice, toffee gin, chocolate liqueur and Amaretto to a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. 
Pour the chocolate syrup into a saucer and dip the top of a martini glass into the sauce. Grate some of the Willie\'s sea salt chocolate into another saucer and dip the coated glass, so the flakes stick to the sauce, creating a chocolate rim!
Pour the contents of the shaker into your chocolatey glass and sprinkle with more grated chocolate - enjoy!

Whitecap Margarita.title: Whitecap Margarita
Whitecap Margarita.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

Sherry Flip.title: Sherry Flip
Sherry Flip.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Loch Lomond.title: Loch Lomond
Loch Lomond.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Nuked Hot Chocolate.title: Nuked Hot Chocolate
Nuked Hot Chocolate.instructions: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

Lassi Khara.title: Lassi Khara
Lassi Khara.instructions: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

Bramble.title: Bramble
Bramble.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

50/50.instructions: fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

Jack's Vanilla Coke.title: Jack's Vanilla Coke
Jack's Vanilla Coke.instructions: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

Poppy Cocktail.title: Poppy Cocktail
Poppy Cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Cuba Libra.title: Cuba Libra
Cuba Libra.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

Tomato Tang.title: Tomato Tang
Tomato Tang.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Godmother.title: Godmother
Godmother.instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

Royal Gin Fizz.title: Royal Gin Fizz
Royal Gin Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Swedish Coffee.title: Swedish Coffee
Swedish Coffee.instructions: Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)

A Furlong Too Late.title: A Furlong Too Late
A Furlong Too Late.instructions: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Thai Iced Tea.title: Thai Iced Tea
Thai Iced Tea.instructions: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

Afternoon.title: Afternoon
Afternoon.instructions: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

The Last Word.title: The Last Word
The Last Word.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Kool-Aid Shot.title: Kool-Aid Shot
Kool-Aid Shot.instructions: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.

Belgian Blue.title: Belgian Blue
Belgian Blue.instructions: Just pour all ingredients in the glass and stir...

Empellón Cocina's Fat-Washed Mezcal.title: Empellón Cocina's Fat-Washed Mezcal
Empellón Cocina's Fat-Washed Mezcal.instructions:
To ensure that your pork fat is just as delicious as theirs, here’s their adobo marinade and what to do with it (you’ll also need a rack of ribs):

4 ancho chiles, 8 guajillo chiles and 4 chipotle chiles, plus 4 cloves roasted garlic, half a cup of cider vinegar, a quarter teaspoon of Mexican oregano, 1 teaspoon of ground black pepper, a whole clove, a quarter teaspoon of ground cinnamon and a half teaspoon of ground cumin.

Toast the dried chiles and soak in water for at least an hour until they are rehydrated. Drain and discard the soaking liquid. Combine the soaked chiles with the remaining ingredients and purée until smooth.

Cold smoke a rack of baby back pork ribs by taking a large hotel pan with woodchips on one side and charcoal on the other. Place another, smaller, pan with pork ribs, above the charcoal/woodchip pan. Ignite the charcoal, being careful to not ignite the woodchips. Cover both pans with foil and allow to smoke for 10-15 minutes, until desired level of smoke is achieved, then coat with adobo marinade and wrap in tin foil prior to placing ribs in a 300 degree oven for 7 hours. When the ribs have cooled, strain off the fat and use for the infusion.

If you’re having a hard time coming up to the same kind of volume of fat, make up the balance with pork lard from a butcher. To get the same depth of flavor without the ribs, heat up the fat in a pot with a few spoons of the marinade.

Once you’ve got your tub of seasoned pork fat in cooled liquid form, pour equal amounts of Ilegal Joven mezcal and fat into a sealable container. Seal the container and give it a really good shake, then put it in the freezer overnight. When the whole thing is separated and congealed, pour it through a fine mesh chinoise. If you don’t have a chinoise, try a fine mesh strainer, or if you don’t have one of those, try spooning off most of the fat.
