There will be some beads of orange fat left in the strained mezcal: run that through a few layers of cheesecloth (or coffee filters in a pinch) to get rid of the last of it.

The mezcal is now ready for drinking, straight-up or in a cocktail. 

Habanero tincture

Slice habaneros and add 2 ounces Ilegal Joven mezcal.
Allow to sit overnight or until desired level of heat is achieved.
Cocktail

Combine mezcal and chocolate liqueur in a mixing glass with ice and stir for 45 seconds.
Strain into chilled coupe.
Carefully "sink" the coffee liqueur down the inside of the coupe over a spoon.
Garnish with 5 drops habanero tincture.

A Splash of Nash.title: A Splash of Nash
A Splash of Nash.instructions: Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

Derby.title: Derby
Derby.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

Stinger.title: Stinger
Stinger.instructions: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

Lemon Shot.title: Lemon Shot
Lemon Shot.instructions: Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass. light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second. Do shot quickly and suck on lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

Banana Daiquiri.title: Banana Daiquiri
Banana Daiquiri.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

1-900-FUK-MEUP.title: 1-900-FUK-MEUP
1-900-FUK-MEUP.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a rocks glass.

Autodafé.title: Autodafé
Autodafé.instructions: Mix and fill up with soda water. Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

Ace.title: Ace
Ace.instructions: Shake all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and ice then strain in a cold glass.

Gin Cooler.title: Gin Cooler
Gin Cooler.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

Rose.title: Rose
Rose.instructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

Scooter.title: Scooter
Scooter.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Banana Milk Shake.title: Banana Milk Shake
Banana Milk Shake.instructions: Blend very well, preferably in a household mixer. Serve in a wine glass, garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

Snowball.title: Snowball
Snowball.instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

Absolut Summertime.title: Absolut Summertime
Absolut Summertime.instructions: Add all ingredients except lemon to shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake vigorously. Strain contents into ice filled collins glass. Garnish with lemon.

Oreo Mudslide.title: Oreo Mudslide
Oreo Mudslide.instructions: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

Whisky Mac.title: Whisky Mac
Whisky Mac.instructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

Cranberry Cordial.title: Cranberry Cordial
Cranberry Cordial.instructions: Place the chopped cranberries in a 2 liter jar that has a tight-fitting lid. Add the sugar and rum. Adjust the lid securely and place the jar in a cool, dark place. Invert the jar and shake it every day for six weeks. Strain the cordial into bottles and seal with corks.

Absolut Evergreen.title: Absolut Evergreen
Absolut Evergreen.instructions: Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.

Creme de Menthe.title: Creme de Menthe
Creme de Menthe.instructions: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.

Bahama Mama.title: Bahama Mama
Bahama Mama.instructions:
Add 2 parts club soda or more or less to taste.

Mix it all together and pour over a bunch of ice. Drink with a straw.

Frappé.title: Frappé
Frappé.instructions: Mix together. Blend at highest blender speed for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold (if you make fresh coffee, mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

Chocolate Beverage.title: Chocolate Beverage
Chocolate Beverage.instructions: Boil milk in the top of a deep double boiler five minutes. Remove from fire and add chocolate, mixed with the cinnamon, a little at a time, beating with molinillo or egg beater after each addition. When the chocolate is thoroughly blended, heat to the boiling point. Place over bottom of double boiler and add eggs, whipping constantly, until they are thoroughly blended and the mixture is frothing. Serve in coffee mug. Serves eight.

Strawberry Margarita.title: Strawberry Margarita
Strawberry Margarita.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

Arctic Fish.title: Arctic Fish
Arctic Fish.instructions: Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.

Tequila Surprise.title: Tequila Surprise
Tequila Surprise.instructions: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

Amaretto Sour.title: Amaretto Sour
Amaretto Sour.instructions: Shake and strain. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Victor.title: Victor
Victor.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Gin Sour.title: Gin Sour
Gin Sour.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

Japanese Fizz.title: Japanese Fizz
Japanese Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

San Francisco.title: San Francisco
San Francisco.instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

The Evil Blue Thing.title: The Evil Blue Thing
The Evil Blue Thing.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".

Bellini Martini.title: Bellini Martini
Bellini Martini.instructions:
Add ice cubes to shaker.
Add vodka.
Add peach schnapps.
Add peach nectar.
Shake.
Strain into glass.
Add lemon twist peel.

Orangeade.title: Orangeade
Orangeade.instructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

Absolutely Fabulous.title: Absolutely Fabulous
Absolutely Fabulous.instructions: Mix the Vodka and Cranberry juice together in a shaker and strain into a glass. Top up with Champagne.

Rail Splitter.title: Rail Splitter
Rail Splitter.instructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

Tequila Sunrise.title: Tequila Sunrise
Tequila Sunrise.instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

Irish Cream.title: Irish Cream
Irish Cream.instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add rest.

Cream Soda.title: Cream Soda
Cream Soda.instructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

Orgasm.title: Orgasm
Orgasm.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

Limona Corona.title: Limona Corona
Limona Corona.instructions: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

French 75.title: French 75
French 75.instructions: Combine gin, sugar, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

Quaker's Cocktail.title: Quaker's Cocktail
Quaker's Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

After Five.title: After Five
After Five.instructions: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled

Wine Cooler.title: Wine Cooler
Wine Cooler.instructions: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

Arise My Love.title: Arise My Love
Arise My Love.instructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

Alice Cocktail.title: Alice Cocktail
Alice Cocktail.instructions: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

Limeade.title: Limeade
Limeade.instructions: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass. Drink. Repeat until limes or soda run out.

Bible Belt.title: Bible Belt
Bible Belt.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

Grim Reaper.title: Grim Reaper
Grim Reaper.instructions: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

Arthur Tompkins.title: Arthur Tompkins
Arthur Tompkins.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

Midnight Mint.title: Midnight Mint
Midnight Mint.instructions: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

Orange Crush.title: Orange Crush
Orange Crush.instructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

Egg Nog - Healthy.title: Egg Nog - Healthy
Egg Nog - Healthy.instructions: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill over night. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

Arizona Antifreeze.title: Arizona Antifreeze
Arizona Antifreeze.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

Champagne Cocktail.title: Champagne Cocktail
Champagne Cocktail.instructions: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

Gin Daisy.title: Gin Daisy
Gin Daisy.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

Hot Chocolate to Die for.title: Hot Chocolate to Die for
Hot Chocolate to Die for.instructions: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.

Rusty Nail.title: Rusty Nail
Rusty Nail.instructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Ice Pick #1.title: Ice Pick #1
Ice Pick #1.instructions: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

Moscow Mule.title: Moscow Mule
Moscow Mule.instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

Abilene.title: Abilene
Abilene.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Long Island Iced Tea.title: Long Island Iced Tea
Long Island Iced Tea.instructions: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

Iced Coffee.title: Iced Coffee
Iced Coffee.instructions: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in coffee mug.

Angelica Liqueur.title: Angelica Liqueur
Angelica Liqueur.instructions: Combine all herbs, nuts and spices with vodka in a 1 quart or larger aging container. Cap tightly and shake daily for 2 weeks. Strain through a fine muslin cloth or coffee filter, discarding solids. Clean out aging container. Place liquid back in container. Place sugar and water in saucepan and stir to combine over medium heat. When sugar is completely dissolved, set aside and let cool. When cool combine with food coloring and add to liqueur liquid. Cap and allow to age and mellow in a cool, dark place for one month.

National Aquarium.title: National Aquarium
National Aquarium.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

Amaretto Liqueur.title: Amaretto Liqueur
Amaretto Liqueur.instructions: Combine sugar and 3/4 cup water in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer until all sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. In an aging container, combine apricot halves, almond extract, grain alcohol with 1/2 cup water, and brandy. Stir in cooled sugar syrup mixture. Cap and let age for 2 days. Remove apricot halves. (Save apricot halves, can be used for cooking). Add food coloring and glycerine. Stir, recap and continue aging for 1 to 2 months. Re-bottle as desired. Liqueur is ready to serve but will continue to improve with additional aging.

Apple Berry Smoothie.title: Apple Berry Smoothie
Apple Berry Smoothie.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

Rum Old-fashioned.title: Rum Old-fashioned
Rum Old-fashioned.instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

Rum Screwdriver.title: Rum Screwdriver
Rum Screwdriver.instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

Thai Coffee.title: Thai Coffee
Thai Coffee.instructions: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

Kir.title: Kir
Kir.instructions: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

Chocolate Drink.title: Chocolate Drink
Chocolate Drink.instructions: Melt the bar in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently (with a whisk, i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.

Bailey's Dream Shake.title: Bailey's Dream Shake
Bailey's Dream Shake.instructions: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

Almond Joy.title: Almond Joy
Almond Joy.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Irish Coffee.title: Irish Coffee
Irish Coffee.instructions: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

Sangria - The World's Best.title: Sangria - The World's Best
Sangria - The World's Best.instructions: Mix wine, sugar and fruit, and let sit in the fridge for 18-24 hours. The mixture will have a somewhat syrupy consistency. Before serving stir in brandy and cut the mixture with soda water until it have a thinner, more wine like consistency. Serve from a pitcher in wine glasses.

Dirty Martini.title: Dirty Martini
Dirty Martini.instructions:
Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.
Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.
Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.

Affair.title: Affair
Affair.instructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

Lemouroudji.title: Lemouroudji
Lemouroudji.instructions: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

Freddy Kruger.title: Freddy Kruger
Freddy Kruger.instructions: make it an ample size shot!!

252.instructions: Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

Whiskey Sour.title: Whiskey Sour
Whiskey Sour.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

Bombay Cassis.title: Bombay Cassis
Bombay Cassis.instructions:
Add the Bombay Sapphire, Crème de Cassis and lime juice to a balloon glass and swirl well to mix.
Fill the glass with good quality cubed ice.
Top up with chilled and freshly opened Fever-Tree Ginger Beer.
Gently stir to combine, top with a gently squeezed lime wedge and finish with a fresh ginger slice.

Classic Old-Fashioned.title: Classic Old-Fashioned
Classic Old-Fashioned.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

Mulled Wine.title: Mulled Wine
Mulled Wine.instructions: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

Kentucky Colonel.title: Kentucky Colonel
Kentucky Colonel.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the courbon and Benedictine. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Blind Russian.title: Blind Russian
Blind Russian.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all liquers. Add milk. shake.

Long vodka.title: Long vodka
Long vodka.instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

Cherry Rum.title: Cherry Rum
Cherry Rum.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Blue Margarita.title: Blue Margarita
Blue Margarita.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

Mint Julep.title: Mint Julep
Mint Julep.instructions: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Cosmopolitan.title: Cosmopolitan
Cosmopolitan.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

Apple Cider Punch #1.title: Apple Cider Punch #1
Apple Cider Punch #1.instructions: If you use the whole all spice and cloves, tie them in cheesecloth. Heat the mixture. Stir occasionally. If you want an alcoholic drink, rum would be nice.

White Lady.title: White Lady
White Lady.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

Sidecar.title: Sidecar
Sidecar.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

Absolut Sex.title: Absolut Sex
Absolut Sex.instructions: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice: Strain into rocks glass: Splash of seven on top.Absolut Sex.

Ruby Tuesday.title: Ruby Tuesday
Ruby Tuesday.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

Fruit Cooler.title: Fruit Cooler
Fruit Cooler.instructions: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.

AT&T.title: AT&T
AT&T.instructions: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir

Amaretto Mist.title: Amaretto Mist
Amaretto Mist.instructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

Malibu Twister.title: Malibu Twister
Malibu Twister.instructions: Add rum & trister then, add cranberry jucie,stir

Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie.title: Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie
Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie.instructions: Juice cantaloupe, pour juice into blender, add banana, and liquify.

Black and Brown.title: Black and Brown
Black and Brown.instructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.

Negroni.title: Negroni
Negroni.instructions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

A1.title: A1
A1.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

Bermuda Highball.title: Bermuda Highball
Bermuda Highball.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

California Lemonade.title: California Lemonade
California Lemonade.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the cherry and serve with a straw.

Flaming Dr. Pepper.title: Flaming Dr. Pepper
Flaming Dr. Pepper.instructions: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer

Flying Scotchman.title: Flying Scotchman
Flying Scotchman.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

After sex.title: After sex
After sex.instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

Angel Face.title: Angel Face
Angel Face.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

Quick F**K.title: Quick F**K
Quick F**K.instructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

Allies Cocktail.title: Allies Cocktail
Allies Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Monkey Gland.title: Monkey Gland
Monkey Gland.instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Pisco Sour.title: Pisco Sour
Pisco Sour.instructions: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

Between The Sheets.title: Between The Sheets
Between The Sheets.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Auburn Headbanger.title: Auburn Headbanger
Auburn Headbanger.instructions: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. ENJOY!!

Jamaican Coffee.title: Jamaican Coffee
Jamaican Coffee.instructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

Brandon and Will's Coke Float.title: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
Brandon and Will's Coke Float.instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

Royal Bitch.title: Royal Bitch
Royal Bitch.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

Rum Punch.title: Rum Punch
Rum Punch.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

Snakebite and Black.title: Snakebite and Black
Snakebite and Black.instructions: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the larger and cider one after another.

A Piece of Ass.title: A Piece of Ass
A Piece of Ass.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.

Atlantic Sun.title: Atlantic Sun
Atlantic Sun.instructions: Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Rum Sour.title: Rum Sour
Rum Sour.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

Lassi - A South Indian Drink.title: Lassi - A South Indian Drink
Lassi - A South Indian Drink.instructions: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.

Arizona Stingers.title: Arizona Stingers
Arizona Stingers.instructions: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!

Queen Elizabeth.title: Queen Elizabeth
Queen Elizabeth.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Turkeyball.title: Turkeyball
Turkeyball.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Midnight Cowboy.title: Midnight Cowboy
Midnight Cowboy.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Vodka Russian.title: Vodka Russian
Vodka Russian.instructions: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

Vodka And Tonic.title: Vodka And Tonic
Vodka And Tonic.instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

Dubonnet Cocktail.title: Dubonnet Cocktail
Dubonnet Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

Zorro.title: Zorro
Zorro.instructions: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.

Boozy Snickers Milkshake.title: Boozy Snickers Milkshake
Boozy Snickers Milkshake.instructions: Place the snickers bars in a plastic bag and roll over them with a rolling pin until crushed. Add crushed snickers pieces, ice cream, milk, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, and chocolate liquor to a blender. Blend until shake is thick and frothy. Pour into glasses and top with chocolate liquor and whip cream.

Strawberry Daiquiri.title: Strawberry Daiquiri
Strawberry Daiquiri.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Shark Attack.title: Shark Attack
Shark Attack.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

Golden dream.title: Golden dream
Golden dream.instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.

Spanish chocolate.title: Spanish chocolate
Spanish chocolate.instructions: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

Absolutely Cranberry Smash.title: Absolutely Cranberry Smash
Absolutely Cranberry Smash.instructions: Stir ingredients together. Serve over ice.

Almeria.title: Almeria
Almeria.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked.title: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked
Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked.instructions: In large saucepan, beat together eggs, sugar and salt, if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight. Just before serving, pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, extracts of flavorings, flavored brandy or liqueur, fruit juice or nectar, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, orange slices, peppermint sticks or candy canes, plain brandy, run or whiskey, sherbet or ice-cream, whipping cream, whipped. Serve immediately.

Rum Cobbler.title: Rum Cobbler
Rum Cobbler.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

Daiquiri.title: Daiquiri
Daiquiri.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Applejack.title: Applejack
Applejack.instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass

Port Wine Cocktail.title: Port Wine Cocktail
Port Wine Cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Spiced Peach Punch.title: Spiced Peach Punch
Spiced Peach Punch.instructions: Combine peach nectar, orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.

Duchamp's Punch.title: Duchamp's Punch
Duchamp's Punch.instructions:
Shake all ingredients.
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

155 Belmont.title: 155 Belmont
155 Belmont.instructions: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.

Midnight Manx.title: Midnight Manx
Midnight Manx.instructions: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

Adios Amigos Cocktail.title: Adios Amigos Cocktail
Adios Amigos Cocktail.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

Rum Milk Punch.title: Rum Milk Punch
Rum Milk Punch.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Frozen Daiquiri.title: Frozen Daiquiri
Frozen Daiquiri.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

Gin Sling.title: Gin Sling
Gin Sling.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

Hemingway Special.title: Hemingway Special
Hemingway Special.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.
